name: delphi-fabric
description: node program to use Hyperledger Fabric nodejs SDK

scripts.install: cd common/nodejs; npm install;lerna bootstrap --no-ci; cd -; cd nodePkg; npm i
scripts.nuke: cd common/nodejs; rm -rf node_modules; lerna clean --yes; cd -;cd nodePkg; rm -rf node_modules; cd -; rm -rf node_modules;
